review_data.title: A good place to place billiard!
review_data.content: The only thing we wanted was to play billiard, and that works perfectly well as the number of tables is enormous. You will definitely always find a free table. It might not have the luxurious billiard-ish atmosphere or the best food as other people have...More

review_data.title: Teuer
review_data.content: Es war ein sehr toller Abend. Allerdings, viel zu voll & viel zu tuere. Wir waren 1h30min dort und haben...More

review_data.title: I like the authentic ambiance there; billiards, snooker, that's it! No silly hipsters and pretenders etc.
review_data.content: The title of my review says it all! It's a huge, centrally located place with more indoor billiard/billard/pool (pick your flavour) and snooker tables you'd ever need. And people who go there really go there for exactly that reason. It thus has an authentic ambiance...More

review_data.title: Bella sala biliardo
review_data.content: Sala da biliardo pulita e ben tenuta. Il tavolo è le stecche sono di ottima qualità e nuove. Il gestore...More

review_data.title: Gross und leer
review_data.content: Wer einfach nur Pool spielen will für den ist der Platz ok. Wer Menschen kennen lernen will, dazu Spass haben...More

review_data.title: coole Aktivität
review_data.content: Super nettes Personal! Haben den Polterabend meiner Freundin gefeiert. Sie waren flexibel und unkompliziert bei der Reservierung. Sind auch leider...More

review_data.title: Grösste Billiard & Snooker Halle der Schweiz
review_data.content: Bin regelmässig hier zum Pool spielen. auf über 1500qm stehen sicher über 50 Tische. Alle super gepflegt. Kugeln und Tische...More

review_data.title: Billard
review_data.content: Wir hatten einen sehr lustigen Abend und der Kellner war Top!!! Aber die Preise sind für eine Billardhalle sehr hoch!!...More

review_data.title: Comodo y alegre
review_data.content: Es un poco caro pero para pasar un rato es un lugar muy bueno. Para ir con amigos o pareja....More

review_data.title: Good Snooker and Pool Hall
review_data.content: Billiardino is a comfortable environment for playing pool or snooker. It is huge – 7 full size snooker tables and 46 pool tables. Plenty of queues, rests, spiders etc. The tables were in good condition. We played snooker and the felt was new, good grip,...More

review_data.title: Large industrial feeling pool-hall
review_data.content: Maybe I'm old-fashioned, but for me playing pool is ideally done in either of the following locations: the basement of a smoky bar; a crowded pub; a dingy hall in a bad part of town; a private club populated by hustlers. Unfortunately, Zürich seems to...More

review_data.title: Snooker!
review_data.content: Have been here several times to play snooker. Not always easy to find a snooker table but here they have several. The facilities are good and prices not too bad.

review_data.title: Das Billiardino ist nur zum Billard spielen
